entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Oxford House
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:44 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:44 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 6:44 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
